TopicTitle: Armadillo Aerospace Vertical Takeoff and Landing

Articles.Content: Guys I was stumbling the net this evening and I found a video of a pretty cool demonstration rocket build from Armadillo Aerospace who is working on reusable rockets. Check out the neat lander legs too!
That was cool.I bet they broke a few before they mastered the landings.It looked very twitchy. Good find

It looks quite top heavy...

Very fun to watch, great find.
That\'s really cool, to be able to see that engine gimbal so much! Looks a little rough though:)
Someone has to make this in KSP now.
That thing look like a spaceship from an old 50\'s Sci-Fi flick. PL:us did you see how fast thing came into land? I could never get myself come in that hot without screwing it up.
Fun Fact: The founder of Armadillo Aerospace is John Carmack from id software. He\'s been at the head of games like Wolfenstein, Doom and Quake. Who says video games are bad for you?

Dat bounce at the end.

It would DESTROY your Kerbals.
